name: Mosque Run Pro
description: Mosque Run is an addictive adventure game. It’s time for Salah and before time runs out you have to collect the key and open the Mosque for Salah. But there are obstacles which are trying to stop you. In this addictive game there are fruits and other eatables to give you powers. You have to jump and move left and right to dodge the obstacles. Remember a clock is ticking there, you have limited time. There are 10 interesting and challenging well-designed levels to play. Come back down if you forget to collect the key, otherwise the door of the mosque will not get open. Download now and enjoy this beautiful adventure game.
